Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Armyworm cecropin-1 (AC-1, natural AMPs; insects, arthropods, invertebrates, animals, UCLL1).

Literature.Author: Lian K, Zhang M, Liang X, et al.2020
Literature.Title: Identification and characteristics of a novel cecropin from the armyworm, Mythimna separata

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (79.5%) toCecropinXJ. Mol Wt: 4262.12; Mol formula: C193H329N56O49S1; Mol ex coeff.: 5550; GRAVY: -0.32; I 10%, V 7%, A 12%, G 12%, K 17%.Activity: Active against Salmonella ATCC13076 (MIC 2.9 uM), E. coli ATCC25922 (1.8 uM), P. aeruginosa ATCC700603 (MIC 29.3 uM), and K. pneumoniae ATCC27853 (MIC 3.7 uM), but did not inhibit B.cereus or S.aureus at 250.00 ug/mL (>58 uM).
